QuestData.Title: The Rise and Fall of Barov Industries: Weldon Barov
QuestData.LogDescription: Accept the Blood Oath of Blademaster Na'Shra.
QuestData.RewardText: "The brothers united once more," he said.$B$B"A world full of untold riches to plunder," he said.$B$B"Wealth beyond imaging," he said!$B$BAnd then he proceeded to drop a log on top of me.$B$B"There can only be one CEO of Barov Industries," he said.$B$BAt least we can agree on that...
